title: Sunshine
lyrics:
Running my money playing the piano and violin
I'm bad I’m sad I'm finally motherfucking ballin
She followed my instagram she fell in love with me keep talking please
No love cash only you know
24 hour business
Excuse me can you speak English

Turn into can you speak Chinese, please bitch

Say some chinese to please me

You love me you miss me hate me

Fake ass I know you better than you know yourself

Too confident am I and I don't need your help

So many problems made me better than you did

We higher gang be the legendary you never can do it man



Turn it up turn it up wo back to back wo

Feel so good wo flow so smooth wo

像瀑布出乎你想象的突出的 all my dude

Love like ya I’m super cool

Fool to make you can't copy like ya



Mali, mali, mali, malibu

Love me, love me, love me, love me too

Shawty beauty feel me in my eyes

Sunshine, sunshine

Mali, mali, mali, malibu

Love me, love me, love me, love me too

Shawty beauty feel me in my eyes

Sunshine, sunshine



One night in Beijing

我留下许多情

We are in Shanghai

伤害了多少人的心

如果到了将来 我还是这样的状态

Don't rush me on my way

告诉你长得丑就不要想太美

东 南 西 北 不同角度

冲 拳 踢 腿 武功招数

蒙眼 弓箭 射到你的红心中间

交给我能没有任何风险



Enjoy the summer

Somebody so younger

希望有你的时光能一直循环着too longer

放轻松 躺在沙滩上晒太阳 让心中 的负面情绪都被阳光清空

Believe me 我会给你买个Tiffany

In evening 陪你看夕阳没人能欺负你

但 别以为这就是爱 就变得大惊小怪

也可能是我喝酒失态



Mali, mali, mali, malibu

Love me, love me, love me, love me too

Shawty beauty feel me in my eyes

Sunshine, sunshine

Mali, mali, mali, malibu

Love me, love me, love me, love me too

Shawty beauty feel me in my eyes

Sunshine, sunshine
